long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
What is DropShop Tool (API)?
DropShop is a reseller / dropshipper online market in Bangladesh.

Features:
✅ Check Reseller Price
✅ Check Advance Amount
✅ Check Stock Availability
✅ Own API Key

How does it work?
This extension will help you to see price, stock count from their original website using our own API.

Note: This is not an official API. (This API collect data from their server).

For more details contact me.
